feed.title: Tag: twitter bar | Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog

entry.title: Twitter Bar Firefox Addon
entry.content:
This is post is now quite old and the the information it contains may be out of date or innacurate.

If you find any errors or have any suggestions to update the information please let us know or create a pull request on GitHub

As I am getting my head around the twitosphere (is that a real word?) I came across this blog post listing some great Twitter tools. I am already using Tweet Deck though I hadn’t spotted the Twitter Scoop button – interesting..

Now installed Twitter Bar which should making tweeting about interesting sites exceptionally easy.

The Twitter journey continues…
